title: New MacBook Pro Pricing: 14-Inch Model Starts at $1,999 and 16-Inch Model Starts at $2,499
content:
Apple today announced that 14-inch MacBook Pro pricing will start at $1,999, while the new 16-inch MacBook Pro will start at $2,499. The notebooks can be ordered on Apple.com starting today and will be available on October 26.


More details to followâ€¦
